title: The Button: Digital Tribalism and the 60-Second Cult
text: Launched on April Fools' Day 2015, 'The Button' evolved from a prank into a complex sociological pressure cooker. Data shows the community fracturing into religious factions based on timer colors, ranging from the elite 'Purples' to the impulsive 'Reds.' What started as a simple countdown became a massive study in digital tribalism, where a single click defined social status and server glitches fueled deep paranoia about the integrity of the simulation.
